cdx6500PCTPortStaticAddrTable.name: cdx6500PCTPortStaticAddrTable
cdx6500PCTPortStaticAddrTable.description: This table contains MAC Address filtering configuration information.

cdx6500PCTPortStaticAddrEntry.name: cdx6500PCTPortStaticAddrEntry
cdx6500PCTPortStaticAddrEntry.description: A list of Source and Destination Address Actions and Bridge Link Lists for each entry.

cdx6500LfcmStaticAddrEntryNumber.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticAddrEntryNumber
cdx6500LfcmStaticAddrEntryNumber.description: The number of the table entry corresponding to the MAC address that is subject to Filtering Action. The Entry Number ranger is 1 - 300

cdx6500LfcmStaticMacAddr.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticMacAddr
cdx6500LfcmStaticMacAddr.description: MAC Address subject to Filtering action

cdx6500LfcmStaticIncSrcLinkAct.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticIncSrcLinkAct
cdx6500LfcmStaticIncSrcLinkAct.description: PASS = Pass incoming frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). BLOCK = Block incoming frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). PASSLIST = Pass List. Links in this list will pass the frame. Links not in this list will block the frame. (See User's Manual). BLOCKLIST = Block List. Links in this list will block the frame. Links not in this list will pass the frame. (See User's Manual).

cdx6500LfcmStaticOutSrcLinkAct.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticOutSrcLinkAct
cdx6500LfcmStaticOutSrcLinkAct.description: PASS = Pass outgoing frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). BLOCK = Block outgoing frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). PASSLIST = Pass List. Links in this list will pass the frame. Links not in this list will block the frame. (See User's Manual). BLOCKLIST = Block List. Links in this list will block the frame. Links not in this list will pass the frame. (See User's Manual).

cdx6500LfcmStaticIncDestLinkAct.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticIncDestLinkAct
cdx6500LfcmStaticIncDestLinkAct.description: PASS = Pass incoming frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). BLOCK = Block incoming frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). PASSLIST = Pass List. Links in this list will pass the frame. Links not in this list will block the frame. (See User's Manual). BLOCKLIST = Block List. Links in this list will block the frame. Links not in this list will pass the frame. (See User's Manual).

cdx6500LfcmStaticOutDestLinkAct.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticOutDestLinkAct
cdx6500LfcmStaticOutDestLinkAct.description: PASS = Pass outgoing frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). BLOCK = Block outgoing frames with this MAC Address value on all links. (See User's Manual). PASSLIST = Pass List. Links in this list will pass the frame. Links not in this list will block the frame. (See User's Manual). BLOCKLIST = Block List. Links in this list will block the frame. Links not in this list will pass the frame. (See User's Manual).

cdx6500LfcmStaticIncSrcList.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticIncSrcList
cdx6500LfcmStaticIncSrcList.description: The individual numbers correspond to the Links which will be filtered according to the preceding parameter: PASSLIST = the listed links will pass the frame and unlisted links will block the frame. BLOCKLIST = the listed links will block the frame and unlisted links will pass the frame. A range of link numbers can be entered, for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12

cdx6500LfcmStaticOutSrcList.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticOutSrcList
cdx6500LfcmStaticOutSrcList.description: The individual numbers correspond to the Links which will be filtered according to the preceding parameter: PASSLIST = the listed links will pass the frame and unlisted links will block the frame BLOCKLIST = the listed links will block the frame and unlisted links will pass the frame A range of link numbers can be entered, for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12

cdx6500LfcmStaticIncDestList.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticIncDestList
cdx6500LfcmStaticIncDestList.description: The individual numbers correspond to the Links which will be filtered according to the preceding parameter: PASSLIST = the listed links will pass the frame and unlisted links will block the frame. BLOCKLIST = the listed links will block the frame and unlisted links pass the frame A range of link numbers can be entered, for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12

cdx6500LfcmStaticOutDestList.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticOutDestList
cdx6500LfcmStaticOutDestList.description: The individual numbers correspond to the Links which will be filtered according to the preceding parameter: PASSLIST = the listed links will pass the frame and unlisted links will block the frame. BLOCKLIST = the listed links will block the frame and unlisted links will pass the frame A range of link numbers can be entered, for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12

cdx6500LfcmStaticMacMask.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticMacMask
cdx6500LfcmStaticMacMask.description: This object contains a six-byte mask to indicate which nibbles in cdx6500LfcmStaticMacAddr object contain a wild card. A mask nibble with value 'F' shows no wild card in corresponding nibble in MacAddress, while a mask nibble with value '0' shows a wild card. Any (0) nibbles in the mask corresponds to 'don't care' location in the Mac Address. Only the significant nibble positions are checked when comparing a frame's source or destination Mac Address to the cdx6500LfcmStaticMacAddr field.

cdx6500PCTPortStaticProtTable.name: cdx6500PCTPortStaticProtTable
cdx6500PCTPortStaticProtTable.description: This table contains Protocol Filtering Configuration Information.

cdx6500PCTPortStaticProtEntry.name: cdx6500PCTPortStaticProtEntry
cdx6500PCTPortStaticProtEntry.description: This is a list of configurable information for each Protocol Filtering Table entry. The parameters include Protocol Type, Protocol Value, link actions and Bridge Link lists.

cdx6500LfcmStaticProtEntryNumber.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticProtEntryNumber
cdx6500LfcmStaticProtEntryNumber.description: The number of the table entry corresponding to the Protocol Type that is subject to Filtering Action. The Entry Number ranger is 1 - 100

cdx6500LfcmStaticType.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticType
cdx6500LfcmStaticType.description: Protocol Type indicates what type of protocol is involved in the frame. dsap: The Protocol Value to be filtered/forwarded is the Destination SAP of the 802.2 LLC Protocol. snap: The Protocol Value to be filtered/forwarded is the SNAP header which identifies the OUI and Protocol type. eType: The Protocol Value to be filtered/forwarded is defined as the protocol ID of Ethernet type frame. newvalDsap : same functionality as 'dsap', new enumeration introduced for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmStaticValue.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticValue
cdx6500LfcmStaticValue.description: The protocol value indicates the value of the protocol that will be filtered or forwarded. for DSAP. Range : 0x00 - 0xFF.

cdx6500LfcmStaticIncProtLinkAct.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticIncProtLinkAct
cdx6500LfcmStaticIncProtLinkAct.description: PASS = Pass all. If this value is used, incoming frames with the specified protocol value will be passed on all links. All other protocols will be blocked on incoming links. (See User's Manual). BLOCK = Block all. If this value is used, incoming frames with the specified protocol value will be blocked on all links. All other protocols will be passed on incoming links. (See User's Manual). PASSLIST = Pass List. Links in the list will pass the frame. Links not in this list will block the frame. An empty list means all links will block. (See User's Manual). BLOCKLIST = Block List. Links in the list will block the frame. Links not in this list will pass the frame. An empty list will mean all links will pass. (See User's Manual).

cdx6500LfcmStaticOutProtLinkAct.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticOutProtLinkAct
cdx6500LfcmStaticOutProtLinkAct.description: PASS = Pass all. If this value is used, outgoing frames with the specified protocol value will be passed on all links. All other protocols will be blocked on outgoing links. (See User's Manual). BLOCK = Block all. If this value is used, outgoing frames with the specified protocol value will be blocked on all links. All other protocols will be passed on outgoing links. (See User's Manual). PASSLIST = Pass List. Links in this list will pass the frame. Links not in this list will block the frame. An empty list means all links will block. (See User's Manual). BLOCKLIST = Block List. Links in this list will block the frame. Links not in this list will pass the frame. An empty list will mean all links will pass. (See User's Manual).

cdx6500LfcmStaticIncProtList.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticIncProtList
cdx6500LfcmStaticIncProtList.description: The individual numbers correspond to the Links which will be filtered according to the preceding parameter: PASSLIST = the listed links will pass the frame and unlisted links will block the frame. An empty list means all links will block. BLOCKLIST = the listed links will block the frame and unlisted links will pass the frame. An empty list will mean all links will pass. A range of link numbers can be entered, for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12

cdx6500LfcmStaticOutProtList.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticOutProtList
cdx6500LfcmStaticOutProtList.description: The individual numbers correspond to the Links which will be filtered according to the preceding parameter: PASSLIST = the listed links will pass the frame and unlisted links will block the frame. An empty list means all links will block. BLOCKLIST = the listed links will block the frame and unlisted links will pass the frame. An empty list will mean all links will pass. A range of link numbers can be entered, for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12

cdx6500LfcmStaticValue1.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticValue1
cdx6500LfcmStaticValue1.description: The protocol value indicates the value of the protocol that will be filtered or forwarded. for SNAP(10 digit hex value)

cdx6500LfcmStaticValue2.name: cdx6500LfcmStaticValue2
cdx6500LfcmStaticValue2.description: The protocol value indicates the value of the protocol that will be filtered or forwarded. for E-TYPE. Range : 0x5DD - 0xFFFF .

cdx6500PCTSrLinkTable.name: cdx6500PCTSrLinkTable
cdx6500PCTSrLinkTable.description: A table that contains configuration information about every WAN Bridge Link that is associated with this source route bridge.

cdx6500PCTSrLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PCTSrLinkEntry
cdx6500PCTSrLinkEntry.description: A list of information for each WAN Bridge Link of a source route bridge.

cdx6500LfcmSrLink.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLink
cdx6500LfcmSrLink.description: The link number of the WAN Bridge Linkfor which this entry contains Source Route management information.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkHopCount.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkHopCount
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkHopCount.description: The maximum number of routing descriptors allowed in an All Paths or Spanning Tree Explorer frames.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkBridgeNum.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkBridgeNum
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkBridgeNum.description: A bridge number uniquely identifies a bridge when more than one bridge is used to span the same two segments. Current source routing protocols limit this value to the range: 0 through 15. A value of 65535 signifies that no bridge number is assigned to this bridge.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTargetSegment.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTargetSegment
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTargetSegment.description: The segment number that corresponds to the target segment this port is considered to be connected to by the bridge. Current source routing protocols limit this value to the range: 0 through 4095. A value of 65535 signifies that no target segment is assigned to this port.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkLargestFrame.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkLargestFrame
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkLargestFrame.description: The maximum size of the INFO field (LLC and above) that this port can send/receive. It does not include any MAC level (framing) octets. The value of this object is used by this bridge to determine whether a modification of the LargestFrame field of the Routing Control field of the Routing Information Field is necessary. Valid values as defined by the 802.5 source routing bridging specification are 516, 1500, 2052, 4472, 8144, 11407, 17800, and 65535 octets. Behavior of the WAN Bridge LINK when an illegal value is written is implementation specific. It is recommended that a reasonable legal value be chosen.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkMode.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkMode
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkMode.description: NORMAL - Bridge link connects to another Bridge using the Link Control Protocol to determine remote Ring Number RFC1294- Bridge link uses RFC1294 (or RFC1490) bridging to connect to another Bridge or FRAD. TRANS- Bridge link does translational bridging of frames received from a Transparent Bridge.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkVsegNum.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkVsegNum
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkVsegNum.description: This is a virtual ring number that is used by the Bridge Link for connecting to another Bridge or FRAD via RFC1294 or RFC1490 Bridging. Range : 1 - 0xFFF.

cdx6500PCTStaticLinkTable.name: cdx6500PCTStaticLinkTable
cdx6500PCTStaticLinkTable.description: A table containing filtering information configured into the bridge by (local or network) management specifying the set of WAN Bridge Links to which frames received from specific links and containing specific destination addresses are allowed to be forwarded. The value of zero in this table as the WAN Bridge Link from which frames with a specific destination address are received, is used to specify all links for which there is no specific entry in this table for that particular destination address. Entries are valid for unicast and for group/broadcast addresses.

cdx6500PCTStaticLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PCTStaticLinkEntry
cdx6500PCTStaticLinkEntry.description: Filtering information configured into the bridge by (local or network) management specifying the set of WAN Bridge Links to which frames received from a specific bridge link and containing a specific destination address are allowed to be forwarded.

cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticAddress.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticAddress
cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticAddress.description: The destination MAC address in a frame to which this entry's filtering information applies. This object can take the value of a unicast address, a group address or the broadcast address.

cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticReceivePort.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticReceivePort
cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticReceivePort.description: Either the value '0', or the WAN Bridge Link of the link from which a frame must be received in order for this entry's filtering information to apply. A value of zero indicates that this entry applies on all bridge links of the bridge for which there is no other applicable entry.

cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticAllowToGoTo.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticAllowToGoTo
cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticAllowToGoTo.description: The set of WAN Bridge Links to which frames received from a specific port and destined for a specific MAC address, are allowed to be forwarded. Each octet within the value of this object specifies a set of eight bridge links, with the first octet specifying links 1 through 8, the second octet specifying links 9 through 16, etc. Within each octet, the most significant bit represents the lowest numbered link, and the least significant bit represents the highest numbered link. Thus, each link of the bridge is represented by a single bit within the value of this object. If that bit has a value of '1' then that link is included in the set of links; the link is not included if its bit has a value of '0'. (Note that the setting of the bit corresponding to the link from which a frame is received is irrelevant.)

cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticStatus.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticStatus
cdx6500LfcmLinkStaticStatus.description: This object indicates the status of this entry. other - this entry is currently in use but the conditions under which it will remain so are different from each of the following values. invalid - writing this value to the object removes the corresponding entry. permanent - this entry is currently in use and will remain so after the next reset of the bridge. deleteOnReset - this entry is currently in use and will remain so until the next reset of the bridge. deleteOnTimeout - this entry is currently in use and will remain so until it is aged out.

cdx6500PCTLtrmStnTable.name: cdx6500PCTLtrmStnTable
cdx6500PCTLtrmStnTable.description: This table contains configuration for Local Termination Station Table.

cdx6500PCTLtrmStnEntry.name: cdx6500PCTLtrmStnEntry
cdx6500PCTLtrmStnEntry.description: A list of parameters for the Station Table.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmStnEntryNumber.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmStnEntryNumber
cdx6500LfcmLtrmStnEntryNumber.description: The Station Number (1 - 64) that is to be configured.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmMacAddress.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmMacAddress
cdx6500LfcmLtrmMacAddress.description: This MAC address must match the Source MAC address of the frame received from the LAN port or destination MAC address of a frame received from WAN for the session to be spoofed.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmSap.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmSap
cdx6500LfcmLtrmSap.description: This SAP must match the Source SAP of the frame received from the LAN port or destination SAP of a frame received from WAN for the session to be spoofed.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfileName.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfileName
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfileName.description: Local Term Station Table reference this parameter for the T1, T2, Ti, N2, N3 and TW values.

cdx6500PCTLtrmProfTable.name: cdx6500PCTLtrmProfTable
cdx6500PCTLtrmProfTable.description: This table contains configuration for Local Termination Profile Table.

cdx6500PCTLtrmProfEntry.name: cdx6500PCTLtrmProfEntry
cdx6500PCTLtrmProfEntry.description: A list of parameters for the Profile Table.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfEntryNumber.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfEntryNumber
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfEntryNumber.description: The Profile Number (1 - 8) that is to be configured.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfLlcName.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfLlcName
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfLlcName.description: Local Term Station Table reference this parameter for the T1, T2, Ti, N2, N3 and TW values.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout1.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout1
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout1.description: This Ack Timer is used by a station to detect a failure of the remote station to acknowledge an outstanding I frame or supervisory frame with poll bit set to 1. Time is in seconds.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout2.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout2
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout2.description: The Receive Ack Timer is used by a station to determine how long it will withhold acknowledgment of a frame(s) from the remote station that require acknowledgment. This is a method of reducing the amount of acknowledgments generated by a link station. When this timer expires, the link station should immediately send an acknowledgment for all received frames not yet acknowledged. Time is in tenths of seconds.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout3.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout3
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTimeout3.description: The Idle Timer is used by a station to detect an inoperative condition of the Logical Link. This timer is started when the link becomes idle (no data to pass and no outstanding acknowledgments) and if it expires, the station sends a supervisory frame with the poll bit set to 1. Time is in seconds.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfN2.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfN2
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfN2.description: This count defines the number of times an I frame or supervisory frame with poll bit set to 1, will be transmitted, due to T1 acknowledgment time-out, before the Logical Link will be declared down (inoperative).

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfN3.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfN3
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfN3.description: The receive count is used in conjunction with T2 to reduce the amount of acknowledgments a station generates. The receive count is used by a station to determine how many frames it will receive from the remote station while withholding acknowledgment of these frames. This is a method of reducing the amount of acknowledgments generated by a link station. When this count expires, the link station should immediately send an acknowledgment for all received frames not yet acknowledged.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTxWindowsize.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTxWindowsize
cdx6500LfcmLtrmProfTxWindowsize.description: Transmit Window Size is the maximum number of I frames a station may transmit without acknowledgment.

cdx6500LfcmBridgeLfMode.name: cdx6500LfcmBridgeLfMode
cdx6500LfcmBridgeLfMode.description: The maximum size of the INFO field that this Bridge Link can send and receive. The minimum value of this parameter or of adjacent Bridge Link or values of Largest Frame Size of bridge wide parameter is used to determine whether a modification of the Routing Control field of RIF is necessary. Deprecated object without replacement

cdx6500LfcmWanDataPri.name: cdx6500LfcmWanDataPri
cdx6500LfcmWanDataPri.description: This parameter specifies the transmission priority of the bridged data over WAN. newvalLow : same functionality as 'low', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmLearnOnlyPeriod.name: cdx6500LfcmLearnOnlyPeriod
cdx6500LfcmLearnOnlyPeriod.description: This is the time in seconds that a bridge will be prevented from forwarding frames after the Forwarding is cleared due to node boot.

cdx6500LfcmLssRingNumber.name: cdx6500LfcmLssRingNumber
cdx6500LfcmLssRingNumber.description: This is a virtual ring number that is used by the 6500 whenever a virtual ring definition is required: to support the LSS in its path trace function and in IP tunnelling for token ring networks. Range : 1 - 0xFFF.

cdx6500LfcmBridgedProtocols.name: cdx6500LfcmBridgedProtocols
cdx6500LfcmBridgedProtocols.description: NONE - No routable protocols can be bridged IP - IP packets can be bridged IPX - IPX packets can be bridged APPLETALK - AppleTalk and AARP packets can be bridged.

cdx6500LfcmMaxBridgeLinks.name: cdx6500LfcmMaxBridgeLinks
cdx6500LfcmMaxBridgeLinks.description: This parameter specifies the maximum number of bridge links that can be configured.

cdx6500LfcmBridgeId.name: cdx6500LfcmBridgeId
cdx6500LfcmBridgeId.description: This is the bridge ID used for bridging between local token ring ports. A value of 0 disables bridging between the local token ring ports.

cdx6500LfcmStpControl.name: cdx6500LfcmStpControl
cdx6500LfcmStpControl.description: auto: This bridge participates in STP and automatically calculates the STE (Single Route Broadcast) frame path. man : The spanning tree is manually configured Configure Bridge Link parameter. newvalAuto : same functionality as 'auto', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmStpBadHelloThreshold.name: cdx6500LfcmStpBadHelloThreshold
cdx6500LfcmStpBadHelloThreshold.description: A Bad Hello counter is incremented when HELLO PDU is received while the STPE Control parameter is configured to MAN. An event (report) is generated when the counter exceeds the value of this parameter. The event will be generated only once during the Bad Hello Time.

cdx6500LfcmStpBadHelloTimeout.name: cdx6500LfcmStpBadHelloTimeout
cdx6500LfcmStpBadHelloTimeout.description: This is a timeout value in minute. On timeout the Bad Hello counter is reset.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout1.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout1
cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout1.description: This Ack Timer is used by a station to detect a failure of the remote station to acknowledge an outstanding I frame or supervisory frame with poll bit set to 1. Time is in seconds.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout2.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout2
cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout2.description: The Receive Ack Timer is used by a station to determine how long it will withhold acknowledgment of a frame(s) from the remote station that require acknowledgment. This is a method of reducing the amount of acknowledgments generated by a link station. When this timer expires, the link station should immediately send an acknowledgment for all received frames not yet acknowledged. Time is in tenths of seconds.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout3.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout3
cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTimeout3.description: The Idle Timer is used by a station to detect an inoperative condition of the Logical Link. This timer is started when the link becomes idle (no data to pass and no outstanding acknowledgments) and if it expires, the station sends a supervisory frame with the poll bit set to 1. Time is in seconds.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanN2.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanN2
cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanN2.description: This count defines the number of times an I frame or supervisory frame with poll bit set to 1, will be transmitted, due to T1 acknowledgment time-out, before the Logical Link will be declared down (inoperative).

cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanN3.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanN3
cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanN3.description: The receive count is used in conjunction with T2 to reduce the amount of acknowledgments a station generates. The receive count is used by a station to determine how many frames it will receive from the remote station while withholding acknowledgment of these frames. This is a method of reducing the amount of acknowledgments generated by a link station. When this count expires, the link station should immediately send an acknowledgment for all received frames not yet acknowledged.

cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTxWindowSize.name: cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTxWindowSize
cdx6500LfcmLtrmWanTxWindowSize.description: Transmit Window Size is the maximum number of I frames a station may transmit without acknowledgment.

cdx6500LfcmBaseLlcLtrmDataPri.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLlcLtrmDataPri
cdx6500LfcmBaseLlcLtrmDataPri.description: This parameter specifies the transmission priority of the LLC LT data over WAN.

cdx6500LfcmLssVirtualPortMacAddr.name: cdx6500LfcmLssVirtualPortMacAddr
cdx6500LfcmLssVirtualPortMacAddr.description: Specifies the MAC address of the virtual LAN port of the virtual ring. The entered value will be replaced by the Burned In Address (BIA) if the LAN hardware is present.

cdx6500LfcmLssBridgeId.name: cdx6500LfcmLssBridgeId
cdx6500LfcmLssBridgeId.description: This is the bridge ID of a virtual bridge and it uniquely identifies a bridge when more than one bridge is used to span the same two segments.

cdx6500LfcmLssNotificationInter.name: cdx6500LfcmLssNotificationInter
cdx6500LfcmLssNotificationInter.description: The Notification Interval Time Deprecated object without replacement.

cdx6500LfcmLssCalculationInter.name: cdx6500LfcmLssCalculationInter
cdx6500LfcmLssCalculationInter.description: The Calculation Interval Time. Deprecated object without replacement.

cdx6500LfcmLssPathTraceCtrl.name: cdx6500LfcmLssPathTraceCtrl
cdx6500LfcmLssPathTraceCtrl.description: The value of this parameter specifies whether or not the LBS is enabled to send the Path Trace frames to the LAN Manager. newvalDisable : same functionality as 'disable', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500PCTTbPermTable.name: cdx6500PCTTbPermTable
cdx6500PCTTbPermTable.description: This table contains Permanent MAC Address that are loaded into the Forwarding Table after a table or node boot.

cdx6500PCTTbPermEntry.name: cdx6500PCTTbPermEntry
cdx6500PCTTbPermEntry.description: A list of the individual elements that make the entries of the Permanent MAC Address table

cdx6500LfcmTbEntry.name: cdx6500LfcmTbEntry
cdx6500LfcmTbEntry.description: The number of the table entry corresponding to the MAC address used for Forwarding Action. The Entry Number ranger is 1 - 8000

cdx6500LfcmTpPortLocalMacAddress.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortLocalMacAddress
cdx6500LfcmTpPortLocalMacAddress.description: MAC Address which is to be used for forwarding.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortBridgeLinkNums.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortBridgeLinkNums
cdx6500LfcmTpPortBridgeLinkNums.description: This is the bridge link to forward a frame with the MAC Address which is the Forwarding Table

cdx6500PCTdot1dBaseLinkTable.name: cdx6500PCTdot1dBaseLinkTable
cdx6500PCTdot1dBaseLinkTable.description: This table contains WAN Bridge Link parameters, one per Bridge Link.

cdx6500PCTdot1dBaseLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PCTdot1dBaseLinkEntry
cdx6500PCTdot1dBaseLinkEntry.description: A list of parameters for each WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkIndex
cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkIndex.description: This is the WAN Bridge Link number (5 - 36) that identifies the particular Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmLinkType.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkType
cdx6500LfcmLinkType.description: This is the bridge type for links which connect to WANs and defines the kind of bridging that will be employed on the link: applies only to WAN Bridge, Links number 5 to 36.

cdx6500LfcmMacAddrFilterAction.name: cdx6500LfcmMacAddrFilterAction
cdx6500LfcmMacAddrFilterAction.description: pass = Pass all frames with MAC address not listed in MAC Address Filter Table block = Block all frames with MAC address not listed in MAC Address Filter Table none = No MAC address filtering to be performed for this link. newvalPass = same action as 'pass', new enumeration added for RFc1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmProtocolFilterAction.name: cdx6500LfcmProtocolFilterAction
cdx6500LfcmProtocolFilterAction.description: pass = Pass all frames with Protocol value not listed in Protocol Filter Table block = Block all frames with Protocol value not listed in Protocol Filter Table none = No Protocol filtering to be performed for this link. newvalPass = same action as 'pass', new enumeration added for RFc1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmStpLinkManState.name: cdx6500LfcmStpLinkManState
cdx6500LfcmStpLinkManState.description: Value of this parameters specifies whether to forward or block a STE (or Single Route Broadcast ) frame while the STPE Control parameter is configured to MAN. newvalForward : same functionality as 'forward', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosFilterAction.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosFilterAction
cdx6500LfcmNbiosFilterAction.description: pass = Pass all frames with MAC address not listed in MAC Address Filter Table block = Block all frames with MAC address not listed in MAC Address Filter Table none = No MAC address filtering to be performed for this link. newvalPass = same action as 'pass', new enumeration added for RFc1155 compatibility.

cdx6500PCTBasePortTable.name: cdx6500PCTBasePortTable
cdx6500PCTBasePortTable.description: This table contains Configurables for the Base Port.

cdx6500PCTBasePortEntry.name: cdx6500PCTBasePortEntry
cdx6500PCTBasePortEntry.description: A list of the individual elements that make the Base Port Configurables.

cdx6500LfcmBasePortIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmBasePortIndex
cdx6500LfcmBasePortIndex.description: The port number of the port for which this entry contains bridge management information.

cdx6500LfcmPortAddrFiltAction.name: cdx6500LfcmPortAddrFiltAction
cdx6500LfcmPortAddrFiltAction.description: pass = Pass all frames with MAC address not listed in MAC Address Filter Table block = Block all frames with MAC address not listed in MAC Address Filter Table none = No MAC address filtering to be performed for this link. newvalPass = same functionality as 'pass', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmPortProtFiltAction.name: cdx6500LfcmPortProtFiltAction
cdx6500LfcmPortProtFiltAction.description: pass = Pass all frames with Protocol value not listed in Protocol Filter Table block = Block all frames with Protocol value not listed in Protocol Filter Table none = No Protocol filtering to be performed for this link. newvalPass = same functionality as 'pass', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmPortStptManState.name: cdx6500LfcmPortStptManState
cdx6500LfcmPortStptManState.description: Value of this parameters specifies whether to forward or block a STE (or Single Route Broadcast ) frame while the STPE Control parameter is configured to MAN. newvalForward : same functionality as 'newvalForward', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500PCTNetBiosTable.name: cdx6500PCTNetBiosTable
cdx6500PCTNetBiosTable.description: This table contains Configurables for the Net Bios.

cdx6500PCTNetBiosEntry.name: cdx6500PCTNetBiosEntry
cdx6500PCTNetBiosEntry.description: A list of the individual elements that make the Net Bios Configurables.

cdx6500LfcmNetBiosIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmNetBiosIndex
cdx6500LfcmNetBiosIndex.description: The Index number for which this entry contains bridge management information.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosStrType.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosStrType
cdx6500LfcmNbiosStrType.description: The NETBIOS name can be entered in ASCII or HEX format. 'ASCII' means ACSII characters may be entered for the name. 'HEX' means hexadecimal values may be entered.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosAsciiName.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosAsciiName
cdx6500LfcmNbiosAsciiName.description: The NETBIOS name indicates the name that will be filtered or forwarded. A name consisting of up to 16 characters may be entered. The name is case sensitive. The wildcard character '?' matches any character. The wildcard character '*' at the end of the name matches all remaining characters.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosHexName.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosHexName
cdx6500LfcmNbiosHexName.description: The NETBIOS name indicates the name that will be filtered or forwarded. A name consisting of 16 bytes may be entered in hexdecimal format ex:32 hexdecimal characters, without any spaces between the characters.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosIncAction.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosIncAction
cdx6500LfcmNbiosIncAction.description: PASS = Pass all. BLOCK = Block all. PASSLIST = Pass List. BLOCKLIST = Block List.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosIncList.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosIncList
cdx6500LfcmNbiosIncList.description: A range of link numbers can be entered. for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosOutAction.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosOutAction
cdx6500LfcmNbiosOutAction.description: PASS = Pass all. BLOCK = Block all. PASSLIST = Pass List. BLOCKLIST = Block List.

cdx6500LfcmNbiosOutList.name: cdx6500LfcmNbiosOutList
cdx6500LfcmNbiosOutList.description: A range of link numbers can be entered. for example: 1,6,8-12 indicates 1,6,8,9,10,11,12.

cdx6500PSTSrPortTable.name: cdx6500PSTSrPortTable
cdx6500PSTSrPortTable.description: A table that contains information about every port that is associated with this source route bridge.

cdx6500PSTSrPortEntry.name: cdx6500PSTSrPortEntry
cdx6500PSTSrPortEntry.description: A list of information for each port of a source route bridge.

cdx6500LfcmSrPortIfIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmSrPortIfIndex
cdx6500LfcmSrPortIfIndex.description: The port number of the port for which this entry contains Source Route management information.

cdx6500LfcmSrPortFramesRx.name: cdx6500LfcmSrPortFramesRx
cdx6500LfcmSrPortFramesRx.description: The sum of ARE, STE and SRF frames received on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmSrPortFramesTx.name: cdx6500LfcmSrPortFramesTx
cdx6500LfcmSrPortFramesTx.description: The sum of ARE, STE and SRF frames transmitted on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmSrPortRingNumber.name: cdx6500LfcmSrPortRingNumber
cdx6500LfcmSrPortRingNumber.description: The Next Ring number of the LAN link to which the bridge route is bridging. This is the ring number to which the Codex remote bridge half is attached. Deprecated object without replacement

cdx6500PSTTpPortTable.name: cdx6500PSTTpPortTable
cdx6500PSTTpPortTable.description: A table that contains information about every port that is associated with this transparent bridge.

cdx6500PSTTpPortEntry.name: cdx6500PSTTpPortEntry
cdx6500PSTTpPortEntry.description: A list of information for each port of a transparent bridge.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortIfIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortIfIndex
cdx6500LfcmTpPortIfIndex.description: The port number of the port for which this entry contains Transparent bridging management information.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortUnicastRx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortUnicastRx
cdx6500LfcmTpPortUnicastRx.description: The number of Unicast Frames received on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortUnicastTx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortUnicastTx
cdx6500LfcmTpPortUnicastTx.description: The number of Unicast Frames transmitted on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortMulticastRx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortMulticastRx
cdx6500LfcmTpPortMulticastRx.description: The number of Multicast Frames received on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortMulticastTx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortMulticastTx
cdx6500LfcmTpPortMulticastTx.description: The number of Multicast Frames transmitted on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortBroadcastRx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortBroadcastRx
cdx6500LfcmTpPortBroadcastRx.description: The number of Broadicast Frames received on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortBroadcastTx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortBroadcastTx
cdx6500LfcmTpPortBroadcastTx.description: The number of Broadicast Frames transmitted on this LAN link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortInboundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortInboundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpPortInboundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to receive link state not in forwarding state .

cdx6500LfcmTpPortOutboundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortOutboundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpPortOutboundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to transmit link state not in forwarding state .

cdx6500LfcmTpPortULPInBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortULPInBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpPortULPInBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Unicast Link Protect being set on the incoming link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortULPOutBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortULPOutBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpPortULPOutBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Unicast Link Protect being set on the outgoing link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortMLPInBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortMLPInBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpPortMLPInBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Multicast Link Protect being set on the incoming link.

cdx6500LfcmTpPortMLPOutBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpPortMLPOutBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpPortMLPOutBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Multicast Link Protect being set on the outgoing link.

cdx6500PSTPortFilterTable.name: cdx6500PSTPortFilterTable
cdx6500PSTPortFilterTable.description: This table contains MAC Address and Protocol Filtering information.

cdx6500PSTPortFilterEntry.name: cdx6500PSTPortFilterEntry
cdx6500PSTPortFilterEntry.description: A list of filtering statistcs for MAC Address and Protocol filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilterIfIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilterIfIndex
cdx6500LfcmPortFilterIfIndex.description: The port number of the port for which this entry contains filter information.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilSrcAddrInDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilSrcAddrInDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilSrcAddrInDisc.description: The number of inbound frames on this port that were not forwarded because of Source MAC Address filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilSrcAddrOutDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilSrcAddrOutDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilSrcAddrOutDisc.description: The number of outbound frames on this port that were not forwarded because of Source MAC Address filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilDestAddrInDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilDestAddrInDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilDestAddrInDisc.description: The number of inbound frames on this port that were not forwarded because of Destination MAC Address filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilDestAddrOutDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilDestAddrOutDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilDestAddrOutDisc.description: The number of outbound frames on this port that were not forwarded because of Destination MAC Address filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilProtInDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilProtInDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilProtInDisc.description: The number of inbound frames on this port that were not forwarded because of Protocol filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilProtOutDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilProtOutDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilProtOutDisc.description: The number of outbound frames on this port that were not forwarded because of Protocol filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilTotalInDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilTotalInDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilTotalInDisc.description: The sum of Source MAC Address, Destination MAC Address, and Protocol inbound frames on this port not forwarded because of filtering.

cdx6500LfcmPortFilTotalOutDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmPortFilTotalOutDisc
cdx6500LfcmPortFilTotalOutDisc.description: The sum of Source MAC Address, Destination MAC Address, and Protocol outbound frames on this port not forwarded because of filtering.

cdx6500PSTBaseLinkTable.name: cdx6500PSTBaseLinkTable
cdx6500PSTBaseLinkTable.description: This table contains statistics for the WAN Bridge Links.

cdx6500PSTBaseLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PSTBaseLinkEntry
cdx6500PSTBaseLinkEntry.description: A list of controls and statistics for each WAN Bridge Links.

cdx6500LfcmBaseLink.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLink
cdx6500LfcmBaseLink.description: This object is the WAN Bridge Link number for control and statistics.

cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkIfIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkIfIndex
cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkIfIndex.description: The value of the instance of the ifIndex object, for the interface corresponding to this WAN Bridge Link. Not Supported, will return zero

cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkCircuit.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkCircuit
cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkCircuit.description: For a WAN Bridge Link which (potentially) has the same value of dot1dBasePortIfIndex as another WAN Bridge Link on the same bridge, this object contains the name of an object instance unique to this WAN Bridge Link. For example, in the case where multiple ports correspond one-to-one with multiple X.25 virtual circuits, this value might identify an (e.g., the first) object instance associated with the X.25 virtual circuit corresponding to this port. For a WAN Bridge Link which has a unique value of dot1dBasePortIfIndex, this object can have the value { 0 0 }. Not Supported, will return zero

cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkBlStatus.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkBlStatus
cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkBlStatus.description: The status of the WAN Brdige Link: configErr = Configuration error on link swDisabled = Physical errors on link userDisabled = User shut down link congested = WAN congested condition inactive = Configured link - ready for use but not active active = Configured and active link unconfig = Not configured. newvalConfigErr = same functionality as 'configErr', new enumeration added for RFC1155 compatibility.

cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkClearStats.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkClearStats
cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkClearStats.description: This is the command to reset the LAN port bridge statistics.

cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkLastStatReset.name: cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkLastStatReset
cdx6500LfcmBaseLinkLastStatReset.description: The time of the last LAN port statistics reset.

cdx6500LfcmLinkBridgeLinkBoot.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkBridgeLinkBoot
cdx6500LfcmLinkBridgeLinkBoot.description: This is the command to boot the WAN Bridge Link parameters.

cdx6500LfcmLinkBlEnable.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkBlEnable
cdx6500LfcmLinkBlEnable.description: This is the command to Enable the WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmLinkBlDisable.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkBlDisable
cdx6500LfcmLinkBlDisable.description: This is the command to Disable the WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkSetLinkProt.name: cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkSetLinkProt
cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkSetLinkProt.description: This is a command to set Unicast Protection for the WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkClrLinkProt.name: cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkClrLinkProt
cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkClrLinkProt.description: This is a command to clear Unicast Protection for the WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkSetMultProt.name: cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkSetMultProt
cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkSetMultProt.description: This is a command to set Multicast Protection for the WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkClrMultProt.name: cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkClrMultProt
cdx6500LfcmCtrlsLinkClrMultProt.description: This is a command to clear Multicast Protection for the WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500PSTSrLinkTable.name: cdx6500PSTSrLinkTable
cdx6500PSTSrLinkTable.description: A table that contains information about every WAN Bridge Link that is associated with this source route bridge.

cdx6500PSTSrLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PSTSrLinkEntry
cdx6500PSTSrLinkEntry.description: A list of information for each WAN Bridge Link of a source route bridge.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkIfIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkIfIndex
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkIfIndex.description: The bridge link number of the WAN Bridge Link for which this entry contains Source Route management information.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteSpanMode.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteSpanMode
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteSpanMode.description: This object is no longer supported.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSpecInFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSpecInFrames
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSpecInFrames.description: The number of specifically routed frames that have been received from this bridge link's segment.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSpecOutFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSpecOutFrames
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSpecOutFrames.description: The number of specifically routed frames that this bridge link has transmitted on its segment.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkApeInFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkApeInFrames
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkApeInFrames.description: The number of all paths explorer frames that have been received by this bridge link from its segment.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkApeOutFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkApeOutFrames
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkApeOutFrames.description: The number of all paths explorer frames that have been transmitted by this bridge link on its segment.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteOutFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteOutFrames
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteOutFrames.description: The number of spanning tree explorer frames that have been transmitted by this bridge link on its segment.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteinFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteinFrames
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSteinFrames.description: The number of spanning tree explorer frames that have been received by this bridge Link from its segment.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSegMisDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSegMisDisc
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkSegMisDisc.description: The number of explorer frames that have been discarded by this bridge link because the routing descriptor field contained an invalid adjacent segment value.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkDupSegDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkDupSegDisc
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkDupSegDisc.description: The number of frames that have been discarded by this bridge link because the routing descriptor field contained a duplicate segment identifier.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkHopCountExcDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkHopCountExcDisc
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkHopCountExcDisc.description: The number of explorer frames that have been discarded by this bridge link because the Routing Information Field has exceeded the maximum route descriptor length.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTotalFramesRx.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTotalFramesRx
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTotalFramesRx.description: The sum of ARE, STE and SRF frames received on this bridge link.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTotalFramesTx.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTotalFramesTx
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkTotalFramesTx.description: The sum of ARE, STE and SRF frames transmitted on this bridge link.

cdx6500LfcmSrLinkNextRingNumber.name: cdx6500LfcmSrLinkNextRingNumber
cdx6500LfcmSrLinkNextRingNumber.description: The Next Ring number of the WAN bridge link to which the bridge route is bridging. This is the ring number to which the Codex remote bridge halfis attached.

cdx6500PSTTpLinkTable.name: cdx6500PSTTpLinkTable
cdx6500PSTTpLinkTable.description: A table that contains information about every bridge link that is associated with this transparent bridge.

cdx6500PSTTpLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PSTTpLinkEntry
cdx6500PSTTpLinkEntry.description: A list of information for each bridge link of a transparent bridge.

cdx6500LfcmTpLink.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLink
cdx6500LfcmTpLink.description: The bridge link number of the port for which this entry contains Transparent bridging management information.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMaxInfo.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMaxInfo
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMaxInfo.description: The maximum size of the INFO (non-MAC) field that this port will receive or transmit.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInFrames
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInFrames.description: The number of frames that have been received by this bridge link from its segment. Note that a frame received on the interface corresponding to this bridge link is only counted by this object if and only if it is for a protocol being processed by the local bridging function.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkOutFrames.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkOutFrames
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkOutFrames.description: The number of frames that have been transmitted by this bridge link to its segment. Note that a frame transmitted on the interface corresponding to this bridge link is only counted by this object if and only if it is for a protocol being processed by the local bridging function.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInDiscards.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInDiscards
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInDiscards.description: Count of valid frames received which were discarded (i.e., filtered) by the Forwarding Process.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkUnicastRx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkUnicastRx
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkUnicastRx.description: The number of Unicast Frames received on this WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkUnicastTx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkUnicastTx
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkUnicastTx.description: The number of Unicast Frames transmitted on this WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMulticastRx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMulticastRx
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMulticastRx.description: The number of Multicast Frames received on this WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMulticastTx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMulticastTx
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMulticastTx.description: The number of Multicast Frames transmitted on this WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkBroadcastRx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkBroadcastRx
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkBroadcastRx.description: The number of Broadcast Frames received on this WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkBroadcastTx.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkBroadcastTx
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkBroadcastTx.description: The number of Broadcast Frames transmitted on this WAN Bridge Link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkInBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to receive link state not in forwarding state .

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkOutBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkOutBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkOutBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to transmit link state not in forwarding state.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkULPInBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkULPInBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkULPInBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Unicast Link Protect being set on the incoming link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkULPOutBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkULPOutBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkULPOutBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Unicast Link Protect being set on the outgoing link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMLPInBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMLPInBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMLPInBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Multicast Link Protect being set on the incoming link.

cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMLPOutBoundDisc.name: cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMLPOutBoundDisc
cdx6500LfcmTpLinkMLPOutBoundDisc.description: The number of frames discarded due to Multicast Link Protect being set on the outgoing link.

cdx6500PSTStpLinkTable.name: cdx6500PSTStpLinkTable
cdx6500PSTStpLinkTable.description: A table that contains bridge-Link-specific information for the Spanning Tree Protocol.

cdx6500PSTStpLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PSTStpLinkEntry
cdx6500PSTStpLinkEntry.description: A list of information maintained by every bridge link about the Spanning Tree Protocol state for that bridge link.

cdx6500LfcmStpLink.name: cdx6500LfcmStpLink
cdx6500LfcmStpLink.description: The bridge link number for which this entry contains Spanning Tree Protocol management information.

cdx6500LfcmStpPriority.name: cdx6500LfcmStpPriority
cdx6500LfcmStpPriority.description: The value of the priority field which is contained in the first (in network byte order) octet of the (2 octet long) Port ID. The other octet of the Port ID is given by the value of cdx6500LfcmStpLink.

cdx6500LfcmStpState.name: cdx6500LfcmStpState
cdx6500LfcmStpState.description: The bridge link's current state as defined by application of the Spanning Tree Protocol. This state controls what action a bridge link takes on reception of a frame. For bridge links which are disabled (see cdx6500LfcmStpEnable), this object will have a value of 'disabled'.

cdx6500LfcmStpEnable.name: cdx6500LfcmStpEnable
cdx6500LfcmStpEnable.description: The enabled/disabled status of the bridge link.

cdx6500LfcmStpPathCost.name: cdx6500LfcmStpPathCost
cdx6500LfcmStpPathCost.description: The contribution of this bridge link to the path cost of paths towards the spanning tree root which include this bridge link.

cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedRoot.name: cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedRoot
cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedRoot.description: The unique Bridge Identifier of the Bridge recorded as the Root in the Configuration BPDUs transmitted by the Designated Bridge for the segment to which the bridge link is attached.

cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedCost.name: cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedCost
cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedCost.description: The path cost of the Designated Port of the segment connected to this bridge link. This value is compared to the Root Path Cost field in received bridge PDUs.

cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedBridge.name: cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedBridge
cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedBridge.description: The Bridge Identifier of the bridge which this bridge link considers to be the Designated Bridge for this bridge link's segment.

cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedPort.name: cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedPort
cdx6500LfcmStpDesignatedPort.description: The Port Identifier of the bridge link on the Designated Bridge for this bridge link's segment.

cdx6500LfcmStpForwardTransitions.name: cdx6500LfcmStpForwardTransitions
cdx6500LfcmStpForwardTransitions.description: The number of times this port has transitioned from the Learning state to the Forwarding state. Not supported, will return zero.

cdx6500PSTStaticStatsLinkTable.name: cdx6500PSTStaticStatsLinkTable
cdx6500PSTStaticStatsLinkTable.description: This table contains MAC Address and Protocol Filtering information.

cdx6500PSTStaticsStatsLinkEntry.name: cdx6500PSTStaticsStatsLinkEntry
cdx6500PSTStaticsStatsLinkEntry.description: A list of filtering statistcs for MAC Address and Protocol filtering.

cdx6500LfcmLinkFilterIndex.name: cdx6500LfcmLinkFilterIndex
